    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackerThread

        public TrackerThread(java.lang.String name,
                     int trackerPort,
                     double corruptionProbability,
                     int maxChunkSize)
              throws java.net.SocketException
        Parameters:
        name - Human readable name for this thread
        trackerPort - Port number where the tracker thread will listen for datagrams
        corruptionProbability - Probability of corruption for received datagrams
        maxChunkSize - Maximum chunk size (in bytes) used by peers
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - when the datagram socket cannot be created

    • Method Detail

      • makeResponse

        public Message[] makeResponse(Message request)
        Method that returns the corresponding tracker response message to a given request.
        Parameters:
        request - The request received by the tracker
        clientId - The client peer that sent this request
        Returns:
        The response message that should be sent to the client

      • processRequestFromPeer

        public void processRequestFromPeer(Message request,
                                   java.net.InetAddress clientAddr)
        Process a control request received by the tracker, from the given client. Updates tracker database if necessary (currently, only upon disconnect.

        public void run()
